meanings.definition: To make someone or something appear heroic.
meanings.sent1: The artist heroized the main character in the painting by giving them a cape and a courageous pose.
meanings.sent2: The director heroized the protagonist in the film by showing their selfless actions and bravery.
meanings.sent3: The children heroized their pet hamster by creating a tiny superhero costume for it.
meanings.sent4: The writer heroized the ordinary janitor in the story, portraying him as a savior of the town.
meanings.sent5: The teacher heroized historical figures in the lesson, making them seem larger than life.

meanings.definition: To treat someone or something as a hero.
meanings.sent1: The community heroized the firefighter for rescuing the cat from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The fans heroized the singer, cheering and waving banners at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The group heroized the class clown, jokingly calling him their comedic savior.
meanings.sent4: The team heroized their coach, carrying him on their shoulders after the championship win.
meanings.sent5: The children heroized their teacher, drawing superhero capes on their portraits of her.
